text: Hey everyone, I’ve got an issue where I have the same module used multiple times on a page and they’re interfering with eachother. It’s. a popup moda that looks for a class name and then displays or displays none. I’ve tried adding the {{name}} to the css/js but it’s not allowing me. I was able to get the css to work in the head of the html, but the js is not playing ball.. any one have any luck with this?

Hi!

I need some light to achieve this:

Is it possible to, in module, insert a custom form (with googlemaps field) and update a HubSpot form?

I suppose i need a field in HubSpot form to save coordinates, but i dont know how to update that field from custom module.
Thanks <@UPDDTPW3H> for helping me with a solution! Legend :raised_hands:
